scripts.minify: npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.minify-css: crass public/gdc/css/style.css > public/gdc/css/style.min.css && rm public/gdc/css/style.css && mv public/gdc/css/style.min.css public/gdc/css/style.css
scripts.minify-js: npm run minify-js-main && npm run minify-js-l10n
scripts.minify-js-main: uglifyjs public/gdc/js/main.js > public/gdc/js/main.min.js && rm public/gdc/js/main.js && mv public/gdc/js/main.min.js public/gdc/js/main.js
scripts.minify-js-l10n: uglifyjs public/gdc/js/l10n.js > public/gdc/js/l10n.min.js && rm public/gdc/js/l10n.js && mv public/gdc/js/l10n.min.js public/gdc/js/l10n.js
